scripts.deploy_token_factory_blast_test: graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --studio token_factory_test
scripts.deploy_tokenfactory_test: graph codegen blast_testnet.yaml && graph build blast_testnet.yaml && graph deploy --studio tokenfactory_test blast_testnet.yaml
scripts.deploy_tokenfactory_main: graph codegen blast_main.yaml && graph build blast_main.yaml && graph deploy --studio tokenfactory_main blast_main.yaml
scripts.build-local: graph codegen blast_main_local.yaml && graph build blast_main_local.yaml
scripts.deploy_local: graph deploy --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ --ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001 ekmanss/tokenfactory_test blast_main_local.yaml
